attributes.action: Make it clear that a Labour Unicorn Brexit should not be accepted by parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
The petition signed by nearly 6m people made it clear we wish to #RevokeArticle50.
2m people marched for a peoples vote.
The parliament cannot decide what options it wants so we must remain as Brexit has failed. It is self-evident that the people want to remain in the EU as it offere the best deal. We have a veto. Any new deal after Brexit will never be as good.
attributes.background:
We wish to make it clear that following the failure of Mays Brexit we wish to make it clear we dont want a different flavour from Labour.
We want to #REVOKEArticle50. If required a peoples vote Remain vs Brexit

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
